channel.title: Assassin is not arsonist, stop saying they are
channel.description:
Arsonist:
-secretly douse players -make players seem as arsonist to investigator -douse at night -kill players all at once -douse can't be removed
Assassin:
-poison a player not-so-secretly -poison during the day -poison can be removed -poison kill in a set amount of time, once by one -must be foraged
similarities: -bypass death immunity -literally nothing else

item.title: Assassin is not arsonist, stop saying they are
item.dc:creator: TryphonX

item.title: Assassin is not arsonist, stop saying they are
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
ThePlex:

You couldn’t reply to that thread?

gets off topic, you see; the original thread was not about assassin being arsonist.

TryphonX:

… just stop honestly.

Tell me what I am doing that needs to be stopped? Posting threads that you think are based on obscure things but are not?

Read full topic

item.description:
Forage vs. Assassinate

Just when you poison everyone instead of assassinating.

It’s like a silent killer type of deal and delayed, sort of like the arso.

@TryphonX

item.title: Assassin is not arsonist, stop saying they are
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
